permissions: Admins and users who are practically trucker managers for the brokering trucker can update trucker brokerages.
side_effects: Updates the brokering trucker and/or brokered trucker relationships for the trucker brokerage.
validation_notes: At least one of --trucker or --brokered-trucker must be provided. Trucker and brokered trucker must have the same broker, the brokering trucker cannot broker itself, and the trucker/brokered-trucker pair must be unique.
